title: Weather Watching
description: Collins Weather Watching is your one-stop guide to understanding weather across the world This user-friendly, authoritative resource includes full-color photographs, easy-to-follow guidance, and diagrams showing you everything you need to follow the weather. As our climate continues to change, more than ever before we need to understand how extreme weather affes the world around us. This praical introduory guide offers all the know-how you need. Inside you will ForecastingHow winds and clouds are formedHow clouds can help you predi the weatherInformation on extreme weather such as hurricanes and tornadoes
author: Patrick Hook
